author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Merck Receives Fast-Track Designation For Tepotinib In Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer In Japan
text:
March 27 (Reuters) - Merck & Co Inc:
* MERCK RECEIVES FAST-TRACK DESIGNATION FOR TEPOTINIB IN NON-SMALL CELL LUNG CANCER IN JAPAN
* MERCK & CO INC - ‍SAKIGAKE DESIGNATION ENCOMPASSES POSSIBILITY FOR A TARGET REVIEW PERIOD OF 6 MONTHS​
* MERCK & CO INC - ‍JAPANESE MINISTRY OF HEALTH, LABOUR AND WELFARE GRANTS SAKIGAKE DESIGNATION FOR TEPOTINIB​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
